name: CSS
description: I have learnt about the basic styling of CSS such as defining the layout of the pages, performing basic animations and making responsive pages. I also explored and have some basic understandings about Bootstrap.

name: Javascript
description: I have learnt about the basic syntax of Javascript such as implementing conditional logics and interacting with the components. I also know the React library and used it to develop several websites including this website.

name: HTML
description: I have gone through the basic html tags that will be used and built several websites with it.

name: Docker
description: I know the basic syntax of writing a docker file such as mapping the port of containers to server, defining docker file to run the react and flask applications. I also learnt how to run multiple docker containers by using docker compose.

name: Nginx
description: I have a little bit of experiences in using Nginx and built a load balancer for a single production server before.

name: PostgreSQL
description: I have been managing a PostgreSQL database for a production server. I knew the basic syntax of PostgreSQL such as HAVING and INNER JOIN. I also have some knowledge about DBMS such as normalization and ERD diagram.

name: Python
description: I have learnt about the basic syntax and data structures in Python, implemented backend APIs for a production website by using Flask and conducted some of the mini data science projects by using Python.

name: Java
description: I have the knowledge about the basic syntax and data structures in Java. I also have been using the JavaFX to build the GUI and JDBC driver to connect a MySQL database for the assignments of the courses in my university.

name: C++
description: I have the basic understandings of C++ such as pointers, data structure and conditional logics. I have been using it to solve some of the competitive programming questions on Leetcode.

name: Golang
description: I have about learnt the basic syntax of Golang such as defining data structure and implementing conditional logics. I also once built the backend of the chat module with socket by using it.

name: R
description: I have the basic understandings about R and built a shiny webapp with it before.
